page.title: 02Gamekeeping & Pheasantry i
page.content: Part of the work at night is looking out for poachers. Many of them come in {unregistered}cars from{Poole.}They steal{deer, sheep and tractor batter- {ies}and sell the carcasses to{Bourne- {mouth hotels. {Mr.Weekes}raises four breeds of pheas- ants:{Chinese, Ring-neck, Black-neck {and Bohemian.}Annually he rears{50,000 pheasants and{2,000}partridges and sends about{2,000}fertilized eggs to the Customs Hatcher per wk. He rec- eives{50%}back as chicks. The birds have to wear a type of{bit {and spectacles}so that they cannot bite or peck an egg or another pheas- ant. After{six weeks}he clips their wing-feathers to prevent their flying away but they grow again later. He feeds the birds and collects their eggs{three times a day. {(CONTINUED ON PAGE 3)
